sub_rules.content: Annotations applying to a class, package, or module declaration appear immediately after the documentation block
sub_rules.formalization: documentation_block,(class ∨ package ∨ module declaration).annotations must be arranged in the given order

sub_rules.content: and each annotation is listed on a line of its own (that is, one annotation per line)
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of line.annotation must be equal to 1

sub_rules.content: These line breaks do not constitute line-wrapping (Section 4.5, Line-wrapping), so the indentation level is not increased
sub_rules.formalization: (multiline annotation contain annotation1 and annotation2) => the quantity of annotation1.indentation must not be equal to annotation2.indentation
